colorTheory.description: The color palette combines classic black and white with a pop of teal for a modern and professional look.
colorTheory.mood: The colors convey a sense of sophistication, clarity, and trustworthiness.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures readability. The accent color adds visual interest without sacrificing accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary black color provides a strong base, complemented by the white secondary color for clean backgrounds. The teal accent color adds a refreshing touch.
